meta.title: Afaq General Services - Professional Government Services in Saudi Arabia | Sponsorship Transfer, Licenses, Official Transactions
meta.description: Afaq General Services provides professional electronic government services in Saudi Arabia for over 12 years. Sponsorship transfer, municipal licenses, Ministry of Commerce transactions, passports, social insurance, and Musaned. Call now 0508298617
meta.keywords: government services Saudi Arabia, sponsorship transfer, municipal licenses, government transactions, Ministry of Commerce, passports, social insurance, Musaned, Najiz, Qiwa, Mudad, Afaq Services

about.title: About Us
about.description: We specialize in providing general services with the highest standards of quality and professionalism

features.title: Speed and Accuracy in Service Delivery
features.description: We are committed to providing our services as quickly as possible while maintaining the highest levels of accuracy and quality in our work

features.title: Handling Documents with Complete Confidentiality
features.description: We guarantee the confidentiality and security of all information and documents belonging to our valued clients

features.title: Customer Satisfaction and Credibility
features.description: Customer satisfaction is our primary goal, and we strive to build long-term relationships based on trust and credibility

features.title: Security in Service Implementation
features.description: We apply the highest standards of security and protection in all stages of service implementation to ensure our clients' rights

banner.title: Afaq General Services
banner.description: At Afaq Services, we aim to facilitate government procedures and provide comprehensive digital solutions that save time and effort. We are committed to speed, accuracy, and security in all our services to be your trusted partner in completing transactions in Saudi Arabia.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We provide a comprehensive range of general services to meet your various needs

categories.title: Municipal Services
categories.description: We provide all municipal services electronically and in-person to complete your transactions quickly and professionally with the highest level of accuracy.
categories.subDescription: Facilitating all municipal license requests from issuance, renewal, and ownership transfer with follow-up until issuance.
services: Transfer ownership of commercial municipal license
Cancel or suspend commercial municipal license

categories.title: Insurance Services
categories.description: We offer a diverse range of insurance services that ensure peace of mind and ease of procedures.
categories.subDescription: We provide comprehensive insurance solutions for individuals and companies including medical insurance, vehicle insurance, and residence services.

categories.title: Najiz Services
categories.description: We provide all electronic Najiz services with ease and speed with precise follow-up until request completion.
categories.subDescription: We provide complete support to complete your judicial and legal transactions electronically with high professionalism.

categories.title: Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development Services (Labor Office)
categories.description: We provide all labor office services for individuals and companies in an easy and fast way with guaranteed accuracy in executing all official procedures.
categories.subDescription: We provide integrated solutions to facilitate all labor office transactions such as issuing, renewing, and canceling licenses and following up on requests until their complete completion.
services: File amicable settlement cases between worker and employer

categories.title: Mudad Platform Services
categories.description: We provide all Mudad platform services that contribute to enhancing transparency and protecting the rights of workers and employers with ease and reliability.
categories.subDescription: Through the Mudad platform, you can complete your financial and administrative transactions related to salaries and wage protection with high flexibility and guaranteed accuracy.
services: Remove wage protection note and restore compliance rate to 100%
Transfer and upload employee payrolls monthly
Add employees and modify their data

categories.title: Social Insurance
categories.description: We provide social insurance services that help business owners and employees facilitate all procedures with professionalism and high accuracy.
categories.subDescription: With our experience, we guarantee you complete your transactions easily whether in employment, data modification, or reducing monthly costs incurred.

categories.title: Passport and Residence Services
categories.description: We provide all passport and residence services quickly and easily with guaranteed high accuracy in executing all official transactions for individuals and companies.
categories.subDescription: We strive to facilitate all passport transactions from issuing and renewing residences and visas until completing procedures completely without hassle.
services: Sponsorship transfer for dependents and companions
Sponsorship transfer for individual workers (private driver - domestic worker) for establishments and companies

categories.title: Civil Defense Services
categories.description: We provide civil defense services with high professionalism to ensure your establishment complies with all safety and security standards.
categories.subDescription: We facilitate all procedures to obtain required permits and certificates with the highest speed and efficiency.
services: Issue fire protection and prevention equipment installation certificate
Issue completion certificate from police for camera installation

categories.title: Ministry of Commerce Services
categories.description: We provide all Ministry of Commerce services with easy and fast steps, with precise follow-up ensuring completion of your commercial and legal transactions without complications.
categories.subDescription: Whether you are an establishment owner, company, or individual, we help you manage and document your commercial business with efficiency and high professionalism.
services: Transfer ownership of establishments and companies
Renew commercial records for establishments and companies
Cancel and close commercial records for establishments and companies
Reserve trade names in Arabic and English

categories.title: Musaned Services
categories.description: Musaned platform provides comprehensive solutions for issuing domestic worker visas with ease and flexibility with precise follow-up to complete requests quickly and reliably.
categories.subDescription: Whether you need a private driver or domestic worker visa, we provide complete support to complete the request with the highest levels of quality and professionalism.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: We collaborate with the best companies and institutions to provide excellent services

testimonials.title: Reviews
testimonials.description: Our clients' opinions about our services

reviews.name: Khalid Al-Abdoli
reviews.comment: I recommend dealing with this office. They have speed of completion and credibility in dealing, and the employee is outstanding in morals and elegant treatment. Always forward, God willing.

reviews.name: Hassna Adam
reviews.comment: Very elegant and respectful treatment and fast service. Thank you very much Iman for your patience and style, and God willing, this is the office we will deal with only, believers God willing.

reviews.name: Ahmed Elayaty
reviews.comment: Excellent treatment from Mr. Ali, and thank you for his morals and elegant style.

reviews.name: Nashwan Al-Shami
reviews.comment: Basamat Afaq office, I dealt a lot with a nearby institution through them, and they were outstanding in elegance, excellent treatment, speed of completion, and credibility. I recommend dealing with them for all government services.

reviews.name: Jafar Jarash
reviews.comment: Basamat Afaq General Services is distinguished by providing excellent and fast services, especially in completing government transactions. The work team is cooperative and professional, enjoying efficiency and comprehensiveness. I recommend dealing with them to get the best service and guaranteed results. May God reward you.
